about_the_game:
An interactive Sex Simulation game with Visual Novel elements, featuring HD graphics and hot animations.
Play the role of a handsome century-old Vampire Prince and seduce three sexy mortals to spend eternity by your side as your loving vampire concubines.

GAME DESCRIPTION

Enter the world of Sex Simulator - Vampires.
Step into the shoes of a handsome century-old Vampire Prince named Caspian and convince 3 sexy mortals to let you turn them and spend eternity by your side as your loving vampire concubines.

The process is pretty simple:
Pick your girl and use your charms to make her agree to let you bite her, then finish the transformation by making her come.
Repeat the process with the other two and show them the privileges of being reborn as sexy vampires.

Don’t worry if you're not a great talker. We have this part covered for you.
All you need to do is flex those finger muscles to control the sex motion and make the ladies come before you run out of stamina.

Choose between 3 types of sex and positions to satisfy the ladies, and feel free to swap between the various camera angles we set up for you so you won’t miss any of the hot details happening on screen.

You didn’t get it right on the first try? Well … it happens to the best of us.
The good part is you can always try again, and again, and again…until you leave every single one of them satisfied.

FEATURES
90+ HD quality renders
HD animations

content_descriptors.notes:
This game is intended for adults and includes explicit, sexual content that some viewers may find offensive. The characters, story, and actions are fictitious. All characters are depicted as 18 and over.
Contains nudity, alternative lifestyles, graphic depictions  of oral, vaginal, anal, masturbation and non-penetrative sexual acts, bodily fluids.
Contains straight sex scenes.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista/7/8
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
